JS - Introduction to Loops

the repetition of code is called iteration In another words, running the same Lines of code for a certain number of times is called loop

Problem Statement

Say you are having a party and you have a guest list which has the names of all your friends. Now, the problem is that you don't remember if you invited a certain friend say "Darth Vader".

Loop in JavaScript

javascript offers you two loops - while Loop and For Loop

When you know, how many times your loop needs to iterate then you can use For Loop.

When you have the kind of loop where you need to stop the loop based on certain condition, you can use while loop
